headline: 3 Industrials Stocks with Bad Fundamentals
summary: Whether you see them or not, industrials businesses play a crucial part in our daily activities. But they are at the whim of volatile macroeconomic factors that influence capital spending (like interest rates), and the market seems convinced that demand will slow. Due to this bearish outlook, the industry has tumbled by 7.9% over the past six months. This performance was discouraging since the S&P 500 held its ground.
